title: DK MedCom HospitalNotification TestScripts
introduction: TestScripts and test examples for HospitalNotification

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)

list.descmd:
This release includes the following changes: 
* Update of EpisodeOfCare-identifieres in test examples in all test examples and id of sender-organization in a few examples.
* Update of the GET method in all receive test scripts, so each message is received based on a unique Bundle.id. 
* Added validation of profiles in all send test scripts with the assert validateProfile.

Initial release of this IG, which is meant to be used during test of HospitalNotification. It includes:
* Instances of test scripts that are developed for use in TouchStone, but may bu used by vendors locally. Further, a description of purpose and usage of the test scripts is included.
* Test examples to be used together with the testprotocol for receiving HospitalNotifications.
